sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: This module provides schemas for encoding information on USD prims for client graphical user interface tools to use in deciding how to organize and present the prims in GUI layouts. This information does not guide the 3D rendering of a data contained in ascene, rather it's about how to visualize the nodes in the graph that comprises a UsdStage.

listitem.para: UsdUINodeGraphNodeAPI - encodes layout information for prims that participate in an interconnected (via relationships) graph, as would prims in a shading network.
